description: One of the Specters found in Kurumada`s original manga, Heavenly Sinning Star, Lycaon Phlegyas is resurrected in the 18th century along all the 108 Demon Stars, and wreaks havoc in Tenma`s birth village in Italy. He is engaged by Pegasus Tenma and finally killed after a short battle. Later he was resurrected by Hades.
name: Tenzaisei Lycaon no Phlegyas
